name: Angry Ballon Blast -pop the ballons
description:
THE ULTIMATE MATCHING PUZZLE GAME WITH UNIQUE MAGIC POWERS AND BOOSTS!
Join the fun world of Emmy Cat and help collect her precious ballons!

Match three or more ballons of the same color to clear the level and collect the ballons from where they stuck. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the ballons while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. No more crushing candies, breaking diamonds, crunching cookies or farming. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!

Discover Ammy’s world to make her smile. Play with the sweetest ballons that will drag you to Ammy’s enjoyable world. Crunch all the same colored ballons by using various boosters such as brick-busting blasts, rechargeable power-ups and many more!

Tap to Blasting, keep tapping to Win the Level!
Just tap to play, show your reaction speed and eliminate skills!

Click on any 3 same adjacent ballonsand take on this addictively fascinating cube blasting trip in ballon Blast!
